message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that's worth at least $1000000 to me. I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to you, depending on your needs.  I'm confident this is an exceptional deal.  Please consider my offer of $1500000. If you're not interested, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $1000000.  Let me know your decision.
